title: Agasa-Kun Wa Yandeiru
alternative_title: 愛重くんは病んでいる。; Agasa-Kun Wa Yande Iru.
status: 愛重くんは病んでいる。; Agasa-Kun Wa Yande Iru.
description:
Description :
        "Please go out with me. If you reject me, I will die."One day, Ichigotani Nanako receives a sudden confession from Agasa Yuki, the genius prince at school who's also her junior in her club. Surprised by this, the natural airhead Nanako blurts out, "I''ll be in trouble if you die though!" and ends up dating Agasa-kun.Anyway, Agasa-kun has an extraordinary obsession and possessiveness, and he has no mercy for any bugs that come near Nanako!This is a doting school love comedy between a gullible, airhead girlfriend and a yandere boyfriend who is overly affectionate!+
